page.title: 04Changing Times.
page.content: Rainford consists of a mixture of both extemely old and new houses of varying styles surrounded by farmland. Bus services have hardly changed, although they are cleaner and more frequent.There was a railway which ran from St.Helens through Rainford and into Southport.It is now the Linear Park.There was a Colliery,a dayhigh, and two pipemakers.These together with a pottery employ a lot of people. Nowadays many small firms exist on an industrial estate. Fashion has changed considerably in recent years.Bright colours and casual clothes seem to dominate. Earlier this century there was the wireless and later the T.V.Now we have computers and videos. Vandalism,theft and personal attacks cause local people to always be on their guard.
